com.tinkerpop.pipes.util.structures

Class Table

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<Row>
          • com.tinkerpop.pipes.util.structures.Table
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<Row>, Collection<Row>, List<Row>, RandomAccess

    public class Table
extends ArrayList<Row>
    A Table is a collection of rows with various table-style access methods.
    Author:
    Marko A. Rodriguez (http://markorodriguez.com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
